verses.verse: <S%G2258><s%> Now There Was <S%G1161><s%> A Certain Man <S%G5100><s%> Sick, <S%G770><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> Bethany, <S%G963><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Village <S%G2968><s%> Of Mary <S%G3137><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Martha <S%G3136><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G79><s%> Her Sister. <S%G846><s%>

It Was <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Anointed <S%G218><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> With Ointment <S%G3464><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wiped <S%G1591><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> His Feet <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2359><s%> With Her Hair, <S%G846><s%> Whose <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> Was Sick. <S%G770><s%>

Sent <S%G649><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sisters <S%G79><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Lo, <S%G1492><s%> He Whom <S%G3739><s%> Thou Lovest <S%G5368><s%> Is Sick. <S%G770><s%>

<S%G191><s%> But Having Heard <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sickness <S%G769><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not <S%G2076><s%> Unto <S%G4314><s%> Death, <S%G2288><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> May Be Glorified <S%G1392><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

When <S%G5613><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> He Heard <S%G191><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Is Sick, <S%G770><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> He Remained <S%G3306><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Days. <S%G2250><s%>

Then <S%G1899><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Let Us Go <S%G71><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> Again. <S%G3825><s%>

Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> Just Now <S%G3568><s%> Were Seeking <S%G2212><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> To Stone <S%G3034><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Goest Thou <S%G5217><s%> Thither? <S%G1563><s%>

Answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Not <S%G3780><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Are There <S%G1526><s%> Hours <S%G5610><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Day? <S%G2250><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Walk <S%G4043><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day, <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Stumbles Not, <S%G4350><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2889><s%> Of This World <S%G5127><s%> He Sees; <S%G991><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Walk <S%G4043><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Night, <S%G3571><s%> He Stumbles, <S%G4350><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not <S%G2076><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

These Things <S%G5023><s%> He Said; <S%G2036><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5384><s%> Our Friend <S%G2257><s%> Has Fallen Asleep; <S%G2837><s%> But <S%G235><s%> I Go <S%G4198><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> I May Awake <S%G1852><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Said <S%G2036><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%>, His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> He Has Fallen Asleep <S%G2837><s%> He Will Get Well. <S%G4982><s%>

<S%G2046><s%> But Had Spoken <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Of <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2288><s%> His Death, <S%G846><s%> <S%G1565><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Thought <S%G1380><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Of <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest <S%G2838><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Sleep <S%G5258><s%> He Speaks. <S%G3004><s%>
Then <S%G5119><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Plainly, <S%G3954><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> Died. <S%G599><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> ' <S%G1223><s%> On Your Account, <S%G5209><s%> In Order <S%G2443><s%> That Ye May Believe, <S%G4100><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2252><s%> There. <S%G1563><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Let Us Go <S%G71><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Said <S%G2036><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G3004><s%> Didymus, <S%G1324><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Fellow Disciples, <S%G4827><s%> Let Go <S%G71><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Us, <S%G2249><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> We May Die <S%G599><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Found <S%G2147><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Having Been <S%G2192><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb. <S%G3419><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Had Come <S%G2064><s%> Unto <S%G4314><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Around <S%G4012><s%> Martha <S%G3136><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Mary, <S%G3137><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Might Console <S%G3888><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Their Brother. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G3767><s%> Martha Therefore <S%G3136><s%> When <S%G5613><s%> She Heard <S%G191><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Is Coming, <S%G2064><s%> Met <S%G5221><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> <S%G3137><s%> But Mary <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> Was Sitting. <S%G2516><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> Then Said <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Martha <S%G3136><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Thou Hadst Been <S%G2258><s%> Here, <S%G5602><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3756><s%> My Brother <S%G302><s%> Had Not Died; <S%G2348><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> I Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3745><s%> Whatsoever <S%G302><s%> Thou Mayest Ask Of <S%G154><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Will Give <S%G1325><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Martha, <S%G3136><s%> I Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Will Rise Again <S%G450><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> Day. <S%G2250><s%>

Said <S%G2036><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Am 1510 V-PXI-1S The 3588 T-NSF Resurrection 386 N-NSF And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSF Life : 2222 N-NSF He That 3588 T-NSM Believes 4100 V-PAP-NSM On 1519 PREP Me, 1691 P-1AS Though 2579 COND-C He Die 599 V-2AAS-3S He Shall Live; 2198 V-FDI-3S

She Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Have Believed 4100 V-RAI-1S That 3754 CONJ Thou 4771 P-2NS Art 1488 V-PXI-2S The 3588 T-NSM Christ, 5547 N-NSM The 3588 T-NSM Son 5207 N-NSM 3588 T-GSM Of God, 2316 N-GSM Who 3588 T-NSM Into 1519 PREP The 3588 T-ASM World 2889 N-ASM Comes. 2064 V-PNP-NSM

And <S%G2532><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Having Said <S%G2036><s%> She Went Away, <S%G565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Called <S%G5455><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G79><s%> Her Sister <S%G846><s%> Secretly, <S%G2977><s%> Saying, <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Teacher <S%G1320><s%> Is Come <S%G3918><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Calls <S%G5455><s%> Thee. <S%G4571><s%>
She <S%G1565><s%> When <S%G5613><s%> She Heard <S%G191><s%> Rises Up <S%G1453><s%> Quickly <S%G5035><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3768><s%> Now Not Yet <S%G1161><s%> Had Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Village, <S%G2968><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Met <S%G5221><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Martha. <S%G3136><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G3767><s%> The Jews Therefore <S%G2453><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Were <S%G5607><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Consoling <S%G3888><s%> Her, <S%G846><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%>, Mary <S%G3137><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Quickly <S%G5030><s%> She Rose Up <S%G450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Went Out, <S%G1831><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Her, <S%G846><s%>, <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> She Is Going <S%G5217><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb <S%G3419><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> She May Weep <S%G2799><s%> There. <S%G1563><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G3767><s%>, Mary Therefore <S%G3137><s%> When <S%G5613><s%> She Came <S%G2064><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> His Feet, <S%G846><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Thou Hadst Been <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5602><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Here <S%G302><s%> Had Not Died <S%G599><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brother. <S%G80><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> When <S%G5613><s%> He Saw <S%G1492><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> Weeping, <S%G2799><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Who Came With <S%G4905><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Weeping, <S%G2799><s%> He Groaned <S%G1690><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Troubled <S%G5015><s%> Himself, <S%G1438><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> Have Ye Laid <S%G5087><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> They Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> See. <S%G1492><s%>
Said <S%G3004><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Behold <S%G1492><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> He Loved <S%G5368><s%> Him! <S%G846><s%>

<S%G5100><s%> But Some <S%G1161><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Them <S%G846><s%>, Said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Was Not Able <S%G1410><s%> This Man <S%G3778><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Opened <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eyes <S%G3788><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Blind Man, <S%G5185><s%> To Have Caused <S%G4160><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3778><s%> This One <S%G3361><s%> Should Not Have Died? <S%G599><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Groaning <S%G1690><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb. <S%G3419><s%> <S%G2258><s%> Now It Was <S%G1161><s%> A Cave, <S%G4693><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Stone <S%G3037><s%> Was Lying <S%G1945><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Take Away <S%G142><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stone. <S%G3037><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sister <S%G79><s%> Of Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Has Died, <S%G2348><s%> Martha, <S%G3136><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> He Stinks, <S%G3605><s%> Four Days <S%G5066><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> It Is. <S%G2076><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Said I Not <S%G2036><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Thou Shouldest Believe, <S%G4100><s%> Thou Shalt See <S%G3700><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God? <S%G2316><s%>

They Took Away <S%G142><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stone <S%G3037><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dead <S%G2348><s%> <S%G2749><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Laid. <S%G1161><s%> And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Lifted His <S%G142><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Eyes <S%G3788><s%> Upwards, <S%G507><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> I Thank <S%G2168><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Thou Heardest <S%G191><s%> Me; <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G1473><s%> And I 1161 CONJ Knew 1492 V-LAI-1S That 3754 CONJ Always 3842 ADV Me 3450 P-1GS Thou Hearest; 191 V-PAI-2S But 235 CONJ On Account Of 1223 PREP The 3588 T-ASM Crowd 3793 N-ASM Who 3588 T-ASM Stand Around 4026 V-RAP-ASM-C I Said It, 2036 V-2AAI-1S That 2443 CONJ They Might Believe 4100 V-AAS-3P That 3754 CONJ Thou 4771 P-2NS Me 3165 P-1AS Didst Send. 649 V-AAI-2S

And <S%G2532><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Having Said, <S%G2036><s%> With A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud <S%G3173><s%> He Cried, <S%G2905><s%> Lazarus, <S%G2976><s%> Come <S%G1204><s%> Forth. <S%G1854><s%>
